page.title: 04WEST SLEEKBURN SCHOOL DAY-am
page.content: { MONDAY} {9.00am} REGISTRATION-CONSISTS OF TAKING A REGISTER OF CLASS AND DOING WORK TO PASS THE TIME. {9.20am}MATHS-SOMETIMES ALGEBRA, FRACTIONS,GEOMETRY OR DECIMALS.WE HAVE DIFFERENT TEACHERS.MR.FERGUSON TAKES SET 2 AND MR.DICK TAKES SET 1. SOMETIMES HOMEWORK IS GIVEN. {10.35am}BREAKTIME-WE HAVE A TUCK SHOP.WE BUY SWEETS BUT SOMETIMES STAFF COMPLAIN OF LITTER.WE PLAY FOOTBALL IN THE YARD OR ON THE FIELD. {10.50am}HISTORY-MR.HALL TAKES US FOR HISTORY.IT IS OKAY,WE LEARN ABOUT OLD KINGS AND QUEENS AND FAMOUS BATTLES AND WARS.WE DON'T GET HOMEWORK.
